mosnterResistances: Damage Resistances bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
monsterCImmunities: Condition Immunities paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone
monsterLanguages: Languages Terran, one language of its creator's choice
monsterSpecials: Magic Weapons. The myrmidon's weapon attacks are magical.
monsterActions: Multiattack. The myrmidon makes two maul attacks.
Maul. Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

Thunderous Strike (Recharge 6). The myrmidon makes one maul attack. If the attack hits, it deals an extra 16 (3d10) thunder damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
